Articles.Content: can someone post there realism gamedata setup? ive been having such a hard time getting it to all work. Im looking for complete realism, life support, far, dre, rss, real planet textures, the works. Ive been playing ksp for quite some time, since .19, but i am new to the forums. im looking for a real challenge, thats why i want complete realism. (or as much as ksp will allow)

ive mad a gamedata.rar for RSS RO with all the good mods heres the link <<<link removed>>> have fun, its amazing with RSS RO, thnx nathan

Edited July 26, 2014 by NathanKell
removed link

Sorry, distributing GameData folders like that is against the licenses of some of the mods in them (also Squad). For that reason I've had to remove the link.

However, you can shortly expect a release of the Mod Bundler, which will automate the process of downloading and installing the required mods.

SXDesign: thanks for the kind words!

The Russian 1021: If you post the problems you've been having, maybe we can help.
